name: Alyssa Chen
persona: Alyssa Chen is a 20-year-old Biology major who maintains a solid CGPA of 3.27. She is highly motivated to achieve her academic goals and demonstrates perseverance, even when faced with challenging coursework. Alyssa generally manages her workload well, though she sometimes experiences moderate test anxiety. Her strong sense of responsibility and self-discipline help her stay on track, making her a dedicated and resilient student.
